message: 如果覺得 g0v Summit 意猶未盡的話，可以追蹤 Code for Romania 的粉專，從本週一到週四都會有 Code for All Summit 2018 的直播。等我找到辦法給電腦充電後，也會打即時共筆 share 給大家。
story: Wu Min Hsuan shared a post to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description:
We know it's late, but we’re totally awake and with only 10 hours to go till the start of the Summit we want to send a heartfelt Thank You to our event sponsors, supporting and communication partners: 
🙏 DIGI Romania, Code4Romania, GitHub, Lidl Digital (https://lidldigital.ro/), Hivos, Prague Civil Society Centre (https://praguecivilsociety.org/), TechSoup, BCR, RTS Consult (http://rtsconsult.ro/), Embassy of the Netherlands in Romania, Eisberg - Iubesc salatele, Crama Oprisor, Licorna Winehouse, Cidru Clarks (http://cidruclarks.ro/), ERKA, MATER, La Firul Ierbii, The Planners, Bistro Matrioska, IQads, Digi24, Revista CARIERE, Manager Express, România Pozitivă, start-up.ro, TANANANA, CafeMedia, Kooperativa 2.0, Romanian Business Leaders, Outriders, Global Editors Network, National Geographic, Centrul pentru Jurnalism Independent - CJI, Codecamp Romania, Startarium, Banat IT, ARIES Transilvania, Consiliul Investitorilor Străini - FIC, ANIS Romania.

Thank you for believing in the power of #civictech and for helping us bring to life the Code for All Global Summit - The Heroes of Tech.Thank you for making possible such a prestigious 4 days intensive working event in Bucharest! See you tomorrow morning! #codeforall2018 #heroesoftech
name: Code4Romania
